scripts.setup: node bin/installcheck && npm install && npm link && ((node bin/clientcheck && cd ../client && npm install) || echo Web app not installed) && ((cd ../server && node bin/appcheck && cd ../app && npm install && cd ../server && node bin/setup.js) || echo Mobile app not installed) && npm run dev
scripts.heroku-postbuild: node bin/clientcheck && cd client && npm install && npm run build
